data.name: Alien Terminal
data.detailed_description:
Turn on this alien terminal which is connected to Cyclos by STRO. Earn in game currency accessible on your mobile while your computer does the work.
This application is intended for fun.

This application is connected to Cyclos a core banking software provided by STRO. You require an account with a Cyclos community to use this app.
data.about_the_game:
Turn on this alien terminal which is connected to Cyclos by STRO. Earn in game currency accessible on your mobile while your computer does the work.
This application is intended for fun.

This application is connected to Cyclos a core banking software provided by STRO. You require an account with a Cyclos community to use this app.
data.short_description: Switch on the alien terminal. Let your computer do the work. Simulation Active. Earn in no currency and perform no currency transactions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Inbuilt graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 700M
